snippet: The singer said he won’t perform in any state or part of the world that has a Stand Your Ground self-defense law like Florida’s.
abstract: The singer said he won’t perform in any state or part of the world that has a Stand Your Ground self-defense law like Florida’s.

headline.main: Stevie Wonder Says He Won't Play in Florida Because of Stand Your Ground Law
headline.print_headline: Stevie Wonder Says He Won’t Play in Florida
